Tour Guide App

Mobile / UX

intro

Tour guide app presents tourist attractions to a user who‚Äôs visiting your city. Project comes under Udacity Android Basics Nanodegree Program.

Tour Guide App - Github Project

Objective: multi-screen Android app to share knowledge about a city we know

Duration: 2 weeks

Tools used: Android Studio, Adobe XD

‚ÄçFinal product showcase: Tour Guide App which presents relevant information to a user who‚Äôs visiting your city


features

The app helps users to:
- find out details about museums, restaurants and events in London
- browse through a list of places to visit
- access additional details on a place with a simple click to see the address, phone number, opening hours etc.

project requirements

- Project is written in Java
- JDK 1.8
- Android SDK
- Android Nougat (API 25)
- Latest Android SDK Tools (Android studio 3.0 canary) and build tools

implementation

The project uses the following functionality features:
- a ViewPager combined with Fragments
- a ListView populated using a custom adapter
- the app displays images for each place or event
- implicit intents for actions such as view map location or make a phone call
